title: Finitely $C^\infty$-generated associative and Hopf algebras
abstract:
We introduce finitely $C^\infty$-generated algebras, which can be treated as
`algebras of functions' on non-commutative $C^\infty$-differentiable spaces.
Our approach is based on the category of algebras that are projective limits of
real Banach algebras of polynomial growth. We prove the existence of some
universal constructions in this and some similar categories. By analogy with
holomorphically finitely generated algebras of Pirkovskii, a finitely
$C^\infty$-generated algebra is defined as a quotient of a finite-rank algebra
of `free $C^\infty$-functions'. The latter notion was introduced in a previous
article of the author. We prove in a full generality a structure result for
`free $C^\infty$-functions', which was announced in that article and proved in
dimension at most $2$.
  The central result asserts that the projective tensor product of a finite
tuple of finitely $C^\infty$-generated algebras is finitely
$C^\infty$-generated. In particular, this makes it natural to consider
$C^\infty$-finitely generated topological Hopf algebras. Furthermore, a
construction called `envelope' provides a functor from the category of affine
real Hopf algebras to the category of $C^\infty$-finitely generated Hopf
algebras.
